doc.field: Chrysler Financial Corp is issuing a 50 mln stg eurobond due April 30, 1992 paying 9-1/2 pct and priced at 101-1/8 pct, lead manager Union Bank Of Switzerland Securities said. The bond is available in denominations of 1,000 and 10,000 stg and will be listed in Luxembourg. Fees comprise 1-1/4 pct selling concession and 5/8 pct for management and underwriting combined. REUTER
